description: A drink that will make your taste buds sit up and take notice, this twist on a classic scotch has the power to surprise you. Mixing whiskey with beets in addition to&nbsp;honey lemon juice is sure not what you'd expect from these ingredients, but it works surprisingly well!
name: Ruby Queen
recipeIngredient: ¾ oz. Freshly squeezed lemon juice
Fresh dill sprig, or tarragon sprig, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the Scotch whisky, beet juice, honey syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the Scotch whisky, beet juice, honey syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 30 seconds until well-mixed.
